head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PASTERNACK, BARBARA (NEE BALANOFF)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PASTERNACK, BARBARA (NEE BALANOFF)

block.p: PASTERNACK-Barbara (nee Balanoff). On September 3 after a brief but courageous struggle with cancer. Beloved mother of Michael and Jonathan. Aunt, sisterin-law & cousin. Adored Professor Emeritus of Long Island University. Author, cherished mentor and dear friend to many. Services are today at 1 PM, at I.J. Morris, Inc., 1895 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn. Interment to follow at the New Montefiore Cemetery, Pinelawn, New York. Donations can be made to SHARE.
PASTERNACK-Barbara I. Eternal mentor, beloved friend. Parting from those dear, our dreams are filled with thoughts of you and love. Terin and Martin Fitzerald
